MajorClaims.Text: I do not agree that this explosion in technology will 'innovate' the education system, by replacing teachers with computers
there can be no school without a teacher
computers will continue to be used by teachers in the learning process, but they will never take their place

Claims.Text: Teachers are not just teachers, they are also friends and conseilieurs
